original_text:
And this he said of Judah:
“Hear, O Lord, the voice of Judah,
    and bring him in to his people.
With your hands contend for him,
    and be a help against his adversaries.”
korean_text: 유다에 대한 축복은 이러하니라 일렀으되 여호와여 유다의 음성을 들으시고 그의 백성에게로 인도하시오며 그의 손으로 자기를 위하여 싸우게 하시고 주께서 도우사 그가 그 대적을 치게 하시기를 원하나이다

sentences.original_text: And this he said of Judah
Hear, O Lord, the voice of Judah
and bring him in to his people
With your hands contend for him
and be a help against his adversaries
